name: Super Mario Bross - Super DWide Edition
name_original: Super Mario Bross - Super DWide Edition
description:
A game project i started a long time ago but never finished.

It is just a mario game but with super Dwide resolution.

The game is not playable. It is just a barebone game.

Press 1 2 3 or 4 to test some levels.

A = Select

S = Start

Z = Button 1

X = Button 2
